response.original_title: Baby Genius - Things That Go Counting
response.overview: BABY GENIUS: THINGS THAT GO COUNTING is an animated foray into the world of numbers. Marching bands, cheerleaders, rowers, and karate students are only a few of the participants in this instructional video designed to get toddlers familiar with the elementary principles of counting.
response.title: Baby Genius - Things That Go Counting
